javacsw.services.pkg

Class JComponentSup$

  • java.lang.Object
    • javacsw.services.pkg.JComponentSup$

  • public class JComponentSup$
extends java.lang.Object
    Java API support for CSW components, such as an assembly, HCD (Hardware Control Daemon) or SC (Sequence Component).

    Each component has its own ActorSystem, LifecycleManager and name.

    • Method Detail

      • hcdInfo

        public Component.HcdInfo hcdInfo(java.lang.String componentName,
                                 java.lang.String prefix,
                                 java.lang.String componentClassName,
                                 Component.LocationServiceUsage locationServiceUsage,
                                 java.util.Set<ConnectionType> registerAs,
                                 scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration rate)
        Describes an HCD component

        Parameters:
        componentName - name used to register the component with the location service
        prefix - the configuration prefix (part of configs that component should receive)
        componentClassName - The name of the class that implements the component (used to create the class via reflection)
        locationServiceUsage - how the component plans to use the location service
        registerAs - register as an akka or http component or both
        rate - the HCD's refresh rate
        Returns:
        (undocumented)

      • assemblyInfo

        public Component.AssemblyInfo assemblyInfo(java.lang.String componentName,
                                           java.lang.String prefix,
                                           java.lang.String componentClassName,
                                           Component.LocationServiceUsage locationServiceUsage,
                                           java.util.Set<ConnectionType> registerAs,
                                           java.util.Set<Connection> connections)
        Describes an Assembly component

        Parameters:
        componentName - name used to register the component with the location service
        prefix - the configuration prefix (part of configs that component should receive)
        componentClassName - The name of the class that implements the component (used to create the class via reflection)
        locationServiceUsage - how the component plans to use the location service
        registerAs - register as an akka or http component or both
        connections - a list of connections that includes componentIds and connection Types
        Returns:
        (undocumented)

      • containerInfo

        public Component.ContainerInfo containerInfo(java.lang.String componentName,
                                             Component.LocationServiceUsage locationServiceUsage,
                                             java.util.Set<ConnectionType> registerAs,
                                             java.util.Set<Component.ComponentInfo> componentInfos,
                                             scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration initialDelay,
                                             scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration creationDelay,
                                             scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration lifecycleDelay)
        Describes a container component.

        Parameters:
        componentName - name used to register the component with the location service
        locationServiceUsage - how the component plans to use the location service
        registerAs - register as an akka or http component or both
        componentInfos - information about the components contained in the container
        initialDelay - only for testing
        creationDelay - only for testing
        lifecycleDelay - only for testing
        Returns:
        (undocumented)
